title: WTB: SGC T206 Wallace, Jennings, Crawford, Waddell
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: SGC T206 Wallace, Jennings, Crawford, Waddell
posts.post_content:
Hi. Would like to purchase a SGC graded 40 (no creases) or 50 T206 of the following: Wallace, Jennings (portrait), Crawford (either one) or Waddell (portrait). Will also add Griffith (portrait), Keeler (portrait), Willis (portrait), Chesbro and Wheat to the mix. Can only afford one at this time so best one wins! Send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!
